name: Duck Hunt VR (clintmich)
description:
v.1.0

Created by Clint Michaud (aka clintmich)

CONTENT

This game is a version of Duck Hunt created specifically for VR.
Contains 10 levels, and a bonus level.
Practice Shooting Range also included.

LEGAL

Duck Hunt NES sound effects are owned by Nintendo.This game is not to be distributed for profit. This game is for parody/fan use only!

COMPATIBILITY

Compatible with HTC Vive
